article.title: Rockville opens new Library
article.text: On saturday the major of Rockville officially opened the city's new library.
The building, which had been under construction for 3 years had been recently finished and now houses the city's new library.
This is a huge success for Rockville.
The major called the opening of the library a huge success during the opening ceremony.
Written by Joice A. Price, leading journalist of the Rockville Daily since 1967.
